name: Amazon Web Services (AWS)
description: A comprehensive and widely adopted cloud platform offering over 200 fully-featured services globally, including computing, storage, and database solutions.

name: Microsoft Azure
description: Microsoft’s cloud platform offering a variety of services including computing, analytics, storage, and networking, aimed at building, managing, and deploying applications.

name: Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
description: Google’s cloud computing services provide a range of solutions for building, deploying, and scaling applications, websites, and services.

name: Hetzner Cloud
description: Hetzner Cloud offers affordable cloud server solutions with high performance, flexibility, and simplicity, ideal for developers and businesses alike.

name: DigitalOcean
description: Cloud infrastructure provider focusing on simplicity, offering cloud computing solutions like Droplets and managed Kubernetes for developers and small businesses.

name: IBM Cloud
description: A hybrid cloud platform that offers IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS services for enterprises to build and deploy applications, with a focus on AI and analytics.

name: Oracle Cloud
description: Oracle’s cloud platform provides comprehensive cloud applications and services for businesses, including infrastructure, databases, and application development.

name: Linode (Akamai)
description: Linode (now part of Akamai) provides simple and cost-effective cloud hosting services, with a focus on Linux virtual machines and developers.
